column5: Does anyone know the status of Golden Fawn Lodge on Lac Seul, just south of Ear falls? We had stayed there for many years and made many great fishing memories. The last time we were there (maybe 2-3 years ago), the camp was beginning to show some wear. I know the proprietors had the camp for sale, and the web page has not been updated for a while. Is the camp still in operation? Any news would be appreciated.

We also used to stay at Golden Fawn. Switched to Gold Pines a few years ago, which is right across the lake from Golden Fawn. Last year when we were up, drove down to Golden Fawn camp and it did not look to be in operation. Docks and boats were still on shore, trees across the access road, and not a light on in the place. Don't know if the status has changed this year.
Any chance the camp is for sale?
Heard last summer it was for sale but don't know the current status.
It's for sale. Make an offer.
One of the best property location- someone should bring this back to it's former glory
